songs.title: Da Gang
songs.lyrics:
Gang, Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang
Gang, Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang
More than 420,000 gang members and many are involved in violent crimes, drug trafficking, and ohter illegal activities
YEAH
We bang the
We from the
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gang, Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang
Gang, Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang,  Gang
We bang the, We bang the
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie

Come on!
On the west motherfucker hands and fixed
And we don’t walk little busta to certain beats
Endo cushie gangsta beats
500 gangs they run the streets
We on the
Shaka laka laka la la la
We smoke the
Shaka laka laka la la la

Come on!
Yeah!
Follow these rules you have
Mad dough to break up
If not the homies
Will do your make up
Post up, chill out, get the cake
Cuz, ain’t  no enemies around here

Yeah!
Except them niggas right there
And them niggas over there

Spit your game
Talk your shit
Grab your gat
On your whip and just
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie

It’s on my mind couldn’t find a place to rest
Till I got the Thug Life tattooed on my chest
Now I just
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Niggas step

Get they whole crew with it
Back in the club with the same old two step
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Yeah! Throw your neighborhood in the air
If you don’t care
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie


The government
Is a motherfucking gang
The CIA are
A motherfucking gang
The FBI
A motherfucking gang
The democrats are
A motherfucking gang
The rep;ublicans are
A motherfucking gang
The police are a
A motherfucking gang
The USA is
A motherfucking gang

Every group is a gang
Every gang is a group
Hood niggas shoot
Police do too
Across the water
Governments commit slaughter
This move out here
Terrorist are a part of
Misinformation, lopsided news
You’re either with us or against us
I guess you gotta choose
So this goes out to whom it pertains
Show me a group I’ll show you a gang


From age to tattoos the profiles are used to keep track of gang activities

I gave my life to the G code
What you think I bang for
Fuck the (police siren)
YEAH
That’s my theme song
We wrong they wrong
Fuck it get your bang on
We don’t step strong
We ain’t never last long
Got it’s own injunction
Now we can’t function
Got us all divided
Now they can conqueor

Homies in the crib
Like the homies in the pen
They don’t like us
Cause the gang that we in


One time straight surrounded my home
Took my  weed my dope  and my car

Cause you know I never stumble or lag last
So I had to haul ass
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie

So you know I don’t party
Or shake my butt
I leave that to the niggas with the funny haircuts

YEAH
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie

YEAH
Throw your neighborhood in the air
If you don’t care
You just
Gangsta Boogie, Gangsta Boogie
